name: Quest for the puppy (Cringenut)
description:
Adventure game with olny need two button(kind of)

Controls:

left : Left shift or 'A' or Left arrow key

right : Right shift or 'D' or Right arrow key

Left to move forward or select item

Right to roate clockwise or use item

Both at same time to open inventory

Space to stop music

The Boss kidnapped your puppy!

Can you defeat the boss and get your puppy back?!

Credits :
